post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
First of all I like to thank to Scott’s well prepared seminar. I wish that more members had attended. It was typical Scott’s seminar well plan, prepared and presented. I strongly suggest we should look into “Struts Framework”.
Reasons if Comm One ever get Java projects - good marketing tool - excellent project management tools as long as each member understands the framework, easy task delegation - easier maintenance - oce customer is committed, customers are playing at our home ground. Framework is continuous changing. Potential projects
Thanks Scott for excellent seminar
post.title: RE: Struts Framework 에 관한 세미나 제안
